long_description: The Electra Straight 8 bike pays homage to classic choppers and hot rods, letting you cruise in fine style. Flat Foot Technology(TM) geometry places rider upright for comfortable, heads-up positioning that also allows a rider to place both feet on the ground at a stop. Shifting system is maintenance free and simple to use; 3 speeds are located in rear hub. Integrated coaster brake is both effective and intuitively simple to use-just pedal in reverse to slow down. Ride in comfort all day long aboard the oversize custom spring saddle; short rear fender keeps the tire spray off your backside. Platform pedals accept just about any pair of shoes, biker boots or flip flops; full-length chainguard keeps pant legs free of oil and entanglement. One size fits most. Specs on the Electra Straight 8 cruiser bike are subject to change.
